english: Everyone has the right to keep secondhand smoke away
chinese: 你我有权拒绝二手烟，例如

english: Passive smoking means inhaling " sidestream smoke "
chinese: 吸二手烟就是吸入支流烟。

english: Avoid or reduce tobacco use and passive smoking exposure
chinese: 避免或减少吸烟及吸入二手烟

english: The long - term effects of secondhand smoke on health
chinese: 二手烟对身体长远的影响

english: The immediate effects of secondhand smoke on health
chinese: 二手烟对身体即时的影响
二手烟造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Second hand smoke can also damage other peoples health
chinese: 而二手烟又可危害他人的健康。

english: They are pleased to not inhale second hand smoke
chinese: 他们很高兴他们再也不会吸到二手烟了。

english: Second hand smoke can cause many diseases in non - smokers
chinese: 二手烟严重危害非吸烟者的健康。

english: Actually , i mind , too . sorry . secondhand smoke
chinese: 实际上，我也介意。对不起，这可是二手烟。

english: Second hand smoke seriously harms the health
The effects of secondhand smoke on family
Secondhand smoke is hazardous to health
Quit smoking and avoid passive smoking
Secondhand smoke will kill you anyway
